original_title: 朗報！期待の新卒AV出演（デビュー）！ 社内のアイドル！えっちで可愛い中山ちゃん（22） 中山琴葉
overview: [The rumored girlfriend is finally here! ] Nakayama-chan, who was talked about as cute at the company information session when he was still an informal candidate. I graduated from university safely and joined SOD. He says he doesn't usually watch AV, but in fact he has a very H personality and loves being asked by men ... Such a girlfriend decided to appear in AV as soon as she joined the company. Erotic, cute and embarrassing ... the best.
title: Great News! This Freshly Graduated Newbie Is Making Her Long-Awaited Adult Video Debut! An Office Idol! Sexy And Cute Nakayama-chan (22 Years Old) Kotoha Nakayama
